name: Tappy Plane (Dcastillo)
description:
Tappy Plane is a game based on flappy birds, where you can control an airplane with which you have to advance as far as possible and get the most stars, these stars will accumulate in the form of points to know the highscore and be able to compete with you yourself and your friends. you have 3 different levels, Rock Mountains, Grass Mountains and Snow Mountains!!

Assets: https://www.kenney.nl/assets
